author: DuShawn King
text:
JOBS: What are your thoughts on the creative strategy known as "Eagle Job Creation Grants"?
In a nutshell, the local WIB acts as the administrator and works with the local SBA and the Chamber of commerce to create small to medium sized micro enterprises in high poverty PUMS to be run directly from community based organizations (CBOs) and employs marginalized residents.
The concept has been proposed to bring down critically high urban unemployment trends in high poverty communities while stimulating economic development through community capacity building and neighborhood enrichment.
title: JOBS Concept: "Eagle Jobs Creation Grant"
